channel.title: [508] server!
channel.description:
[size=36pt][font=arial black]hello i have my new server up and running admin spots up for grabs[/font][/size]
hi this is my server has a good quality for 508 not over the top modded and not plain pretty good and fun to play i dont have pics atm as my laptop got restored and deleted my snipping tool and i dont know where to find a new one its not 24/7 server so i wont be online all the time but i will be online allot wanna be a mod admin play and ask if your in the first 10 you will defo get a place u must have hamachi! i know how to do it without i dont want to tho join network rs4ever.rsps pass is 123
client:
i do not own anythink credits 70% rs4ever 29% 508punch 1% me for posting :):D:)
have fun guys!!!!!!
(explanation) the reason i use hamachi is because i like to see who is on my server and with hamachi i have a better visual
